name: Button Button
description: Button Bros is a two-player platformer puzzle-solving game. Players need to use limited resources to help their partner passing different laser obstacles. This two brothers are going share their weal and woe to complete a fantastic adventure by the lead of Mr. Bunny.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (Windows 8 is not officially supported) Processor: 1.4GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card made within the last 4 years (Pixel Shader 3.0, Vertex Shader 3.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: With the right drivers the game supports the Microsoft® Xbox 360, Sony PS3/PS4 controllers.
